name: Defense Evasion - Virtualization/Sandbox Evasion (T1497)
description: Detects processes or behaviors attempting to detect or evade virtualization or sandbox environments. Adversaries may use environment checks to avoid execution during analysis.
author: Wahid Hendrawan
query: process.args:(*VBox* OR *VMware* OR *VirtualBox* OR *qemu* OR *vboxservice* OR *vmtoolsd* OR *sandbox* OR *malware-analysis*)
